text.value: Notification Administrative Data
Data about who and where the notification is made
Country where the Record originated
Name of the local level institution that performs the primary notification.
Subnational Geographic Level Code of the Location of the Notifying Institution
Name of the Subnational Geographic Level of the Location of the Notifying Institution
Profession code of the notifier
Administrative Dates (at least one date is necessary)
Date of the first consultation with the health service due to ESAVI
Date on which the surveillance system officially becomes aware of the occurrence of the event.
Date on which the notifier finishes filling out the notification form (if the form is electronic, it is the same as notificationdate)
Recorded date of arrival of the notification to the national level database (if the record is electronic, it is the same as dateNotification)
Vaccinated Demographic Data generated by ESAVI
Vaccinated Person Data
UUID that identifies the case or notification. A person can have more than one notification.
UUID identification of the person vaccinated/affected by ESAVI
Subnational Geographic Level Code of the Habitual Residence of the Person affected by ESAVI
Name Subnational Geographic Level of the Habitual Residence of the Person affected by ESAVI
Sex of the vaccinated.
Date of birth of the vaccinated person
Name of the ethnic group with which the vaccinated person identifies
Medical history identified by the patient
See if you participated in any clinical trials for COVID-19
History of previous illnesses

Description of previous health problems in the person affected by ESAVI with emphasis on comorbidities or diseases concomitant to the adverse event, similar previous events and medical events relevant to the current health event (if the disease is coded, it is the description corresponding to the code).
MedDRA code of the medical history
ICD-10/ICD-11/SNOMED code of the medical history
Declaration of existence of previous adverse events
History of adverse events similar to the current one
History of allergic reactions to medications
History of allergic reactions to other vaccines
History of diagnosis of SARS-CoV-2 infection
History of diagnosis of SARS-CoV-2 infection (Yes/No/Don't Know)
Diagnosis of Covid-19 without symptoms (Yes/No/Don't Know)
Date the first sign and/or symptom of COVID-19 began.
Type of COVID-19 diagnosis confirmation
Date on which the sample was taken for COVID-19 examination
Pregnancy status
Were you pregnant at the time of the vaccine?
Was she pregnant at the time of the ESAVI?
Date of the Patient's last menstruation
Date of delivery, or probable date of delivery (calculated or indicated by the person affected by ESAVI)
Current gestational age if pregnant or at the time of delivery of the most recent pregnancy
Response corresponding to the query about whether the patient was monitored once vaccinated
Pharmacological History
History of medications that the patient took at the time of the ESAVI
Name of the medication taken concomitantly with the vaccine or relevant to ESAVI, in free text (if coded, it is the code description)
